entities.name: bertha jorkins
entities.description: Bertha Jorkins was a student at Hogwarts when Sirius was there. She is described as 'very nosy' but 'no brains'. Sirius thinks she would be easy to lure into a trap.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius knew Bertha Jorkins and attended Hogwarts with her. He is described as grim when talking about her.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is being targeted by the tournament. Sirius thinks it's a good plan to attack Harry through the tournament.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone who could be powerful enough to protect Karkaroff. Sirius thinks Voldemort might be behind the plot.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is a suspect in the plot. Sirius doesn't think he would go back to Voldemort unless he knew Voldemort was powerful enough to protect him.

relationships.description: Sirius knew Bertha Jorkins when they were at Hogwarts.
Voldemort might be powerful enough to protect Karkaroff, according to Sirius.
Harry is being targeted by the tournament, according to Sirius's plan.
